channel.title: Insane Chris Bush Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Whoa magic mind reading
item.description: Apparently it has become insane outside. nasa is planning on reading people minds.. what.. wtf.. what.. no sense.. A senetor is questioning the lack of enron indictments.. no.. I hope bush doesn’t get mad an shoot him .. in texas style.. iraq and russia signed or are goign to sign a deal.. I wonder if this will lead to WW3.. hopefully.. weeeeeeeeeeeeee but if WW3 starts.. I am sure the plans would be leaked to the press so that we woudl all know what is going on.
